roles.title: Account Executive
requirements: Post graduate degree in Public Relations, Communications, Marketing, or related field
Previous internship experience in public relations
Exceptional written and verbal communication skills
Ability to multitask and meet tight deadlines
Familiarity with PR tools and software
responsibilities: Develop and execute PR strategies aligned with business objectives
Cultivate relationships with media professionals, influencers, and thought leaders
Craft press releases, media kits, and engaging content
Manage media inquiries and foster influencer relations
Monitor and analyze media coverage and campaign performance
Organize media events, press conferences, and product launches
Stay ahead of industry trends and leverage emerging opportunities
